content: VC 150-6 XE Dust extractor Powerful dust extractor with built-in power outlet for connection with power tools and jobsite clean ups (wet & dry), 4 gallon tank - OSHA compliant with 150 CFM ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > Construction vacuums and dust extractors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Sturdy wet/dry dust extractor – built to handle dust extraction and clean-ups when working with all your Hilti power tools Built-in power outlet – allows you to run an additional tool directly from the vacuum, with automatic suction whenever the tool turns on Automatic filter cleaning – adaptive filter cleaning maintains consistent suction performance and activates only when necessary, helping reduce noise and work interruptions Built for durability – robust housing, wheels and accessories engineered for the harshest jobsite conditions Easy organization and transport – keep your gear stored with built-in accessories, including bungee cords for hose and power cable storage, and an optional soft bag for spare filters and more Applications Dust extraction from grinding, cutting, slitting, drilling and dry coring tools Wet and dry cleaning Dust extractor for wood and saw dust ### TECHNICAL DATA: Max. Vacuum: 3.55 psi Water capacity: 2.4 gallon (US) Container capacity: 15 l Technical Data | Max. Vacuum | 3.55 psi | Water capacity | 2.4 gal (US) | Container capacity | 15 l | Dust capacity | 33 lb | Application | Cleaning, Drilling and breaking, Wood sawing, Cutting and grinding (light, up to 125 mm / 5 in), Drywall and wood sanding, Wet coring, Socket cutting | Integrated power socket | Yes | Max socket output current | 11 A | Power source | Corded | Suction capacity | 150 cfm | Supply cord length | 275.59 in ### ITEMS- 2411710 - Dust extractor VC 150-6 XE 120V - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x VC 150-6 XE 120V Dust extractor - 1x Filter VC 150-X Gen 2 wet/dry HEPA - 1x Hose 36mm x 4.6m (15 ft) anti-static - 3950907 - Dust Extractor VC 150-6 XE - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x VC 150-6 XE 120V Dust extractor - 1x Filter VC 150-X Gen 2 wet/dry HEPA - 1x Hose 36mm x 4.6m (15 ft) anti-static - 1x Shoulder strap VC 150-6 - 1x Adapter NEMA 5-20P / 5-15P
